title: Reminder to Purge your YouTube sub list from time to time
body:
I just recently went through and unsubbed a lot of the clickbait, vomit inducing trash that was clogging up my subscription feed on YouTube.

I feel great :) Going through and mass unsubbing is a great way to get all those click bait videos out of your face. redmercy, phylol, and foxdrop are the ones i am most happy to see  go, they've overstayed their welcome. I subbed back when I was naive, but I have since learned.... these videos are garbage.
